name: Zombona
description:
It's a 3D isometric shooting game, revolving around covid-19

In the story, the virus has mutated and slowly driven the citizens mad into a zombie-like frenzy

Keep yourself alive through effective "social distancing", curing as many zombies as possible to make them your allies, and shooting the rest. Use your limited number of masks to give yourself temporary immunity to get out of tight spots

All instructions are given in-game

Be sure to check out the endless mode at the end to set your high score!

Credits

Music and Sound effects were gotten from the internet and were then edited 

Models were used from  some of my old projects and a few(the buildings), from the internet

Animations were gotten from the internet
